title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.6 - Authority of the state division of safety
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.6 - Authority of the state division of safety

State Regulations

Authorized representatives of the Division of Safety and
its bureau of fire mobilization and control have these powers, functions and
duties: (a) direct the dispatch of
manpower and equipment of fire departments consistent with maintenance of local
fire protection; (b) coordinate the
response and assignment of manpower and equipment under direction of the fire
chief in command. Image

Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
